item.description:
From the World Music Crash Arts Website:

For over a decade, the Ottawa-based Souljazz Orchestra has been bridging the gap between funk and Afrobeat. The band delivers its signature majestic, horn-drenched melodies driven by a percussive explosion of soul, jazz, Latin, and Caribbean rhythms and primitive keyboards, with lyrics touching on politics and spirituality. The multicultural collective will release their new collaborative recording, Solidarity, this September. Zongo Junction will open.

Tickets are $15 and can be purchased here:

http://www.worldmusic.org/the-souljazz-orchestra-0-949

We will probably either meetup beforehand or afterward for drinks/eats nearby, stay tuned
item.name: The Souljazz Orchestra
